title: Attempting to Reconnect
body:
Hello, 
I am having this problem where my ping and fps are stable and i just get an attempting to reconnect in game. Note that my internet is working fine during the periods of "attempting to reconnect" as all the internet lights and my skype are working fine in the background. The issue appeared out of nowhere a few days ago and has made the game really frustrating for me. Furthermore, when i attempt to reconnect i see enemy champions move and kill me while my character just stays still and i watch it die.

replies.body: I've been getting this too for a couple months now. It always tends to fix itself within 15 seconds, so I never really bothered looking into it

The issue you are experiencing sounds like it could be due to packet loss caused by routing to the servers.  As a first step, I recommend going over our [Troubleshoot Connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get this fixed up.  

If the issue persists, we have a tech team that can look into this further for you.  Run a [traceroute ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) which can determine how your network is routing, and[ submit it in a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to them.  

I hope that helps!
